title: Wrong Summoner Level
body: Boards seems to think I'm a lower level than I actually am, and this stops me from commenting. Apparently this has been a problem for others for like years?

replies.body:
Yea it's a minor issue where your boards level doesn't correctly update with your Summoner level. Posting here in H&S like you did gets a manual sync pushed through, or you can use the [**Profile Syncing Tool**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool) we have stickied at the top! 

Looks like posting here worked since you're showing up as level 21 for me now.
